programme.title: Military intervention in Bosnia
programme.short_synopsis: A continuation of the war in Bosnia, and President Clinton's attitude on intervention.
programme.medium_synopsis: President Clinton's concerns over US military intervention, a newfound resolve over the war in Bosnia and a bogeyman in the shape of a Russian bear are discussed by Alistair Cooke.

programme.title: Letter from America by Alistair Cooke
programme.short_synopsis: Alistair Cooke’s weekly talks on American life, history and politics from 1946 – 2004.
